Inversion#

Inversion#

Perform inversion of many profiles with simple parallelization using mpi4py.

inversion.execute_inversion_1c(conf, task_folder, rank)[source]#

Executes inversion and creates if needed random guesses. Make sure that when this function is entered, the os is in the right directory! This function can be used for the mode ‘MC’ and ‘1C’.

Parameters:
configdict

Dictionary containing the configuration of the simulation

task_folderstr

String of the directory where this code should executed

rankint

Process Number

Returns:
outfloat

Best chi2 value of the inversion(s)

inversion.execute_inversion_2c(conf, task_folder, rank)[source]#

Executes inversion and creates if needed random guesses. Make sure that when this function is entered, the os is in the right directory! This is used for the mode ‘2C’.

Parameters:
confDictionary

Dictionary containing the configuration of the simulation

task_folderstr

Task folder where the code is going

rankint

Process Number

Returns:
outfloat

Best chi2 value of the inversion(s)

inversion.inversion_1c(conf, comm, rank, size, MPI)[source]#

Performs the inversion of all the models for the 1 component inversion.

Parameters:
configdict

Dictionary with all information from the config file

commIntercomm

MPI communicator

rankint

Number of actual process

sizeint

Number of available processes

MPIlibrary

MPI library imported as ‘from mpi4py import MPI’

Returns:
None
inversion.inversion_2c(conf, comm, rank, size, MPI)[source]#

Performs the inversion of all the models for the 2 component inversion.

Parameters:
confdict

Dictionary with all information from the config file

commIntercomm

MPI communicator

rankint

Number of actual process

sizeint

Number of available processes

MPIlibrary

MPI library imported as ‘from mpi4py import MPI’

Returns:
None
inversion.inversion_mc(conf, comm, rank, size, MPI)[source]#

Performs the inversion of all the models for the MC simulation.

Parameters:
confdict

Dictionary with all information from the config file

commIntercomm

MPI communicator

rankint

Number of actual process

sizeint

Number of available processes

MPIlibrary

MPI library imported as ‘from mpi4py import MPI’

Returns:
None
inversion.scatter_data(conf, comm, rank, size, return_stk=False)[source]#

Loads and scatters the data equally into all the processes.

Parameters:
confDict

Config information

commIntercomm

MPI communicator

rankint

Number of actual process

sizeint

Number of available processes

return_stkbool

If True, the full stokes profile is also returned

Returns:
scatter_dataprofile_stk

Stokes Profiles used in each process

scatter_datadict

Dictionary with the folders, x and y positions for each process

scatter_dataprofile_stk

Complete stokes profiles in rank 0 (in other ranks ‘None’) if return_stk = True

inversion.scatter_data_mc(conf, comm, rank, size, return_stk=False)[source]#

Scatters the data equally into all the ranks for the MC simulation.

Parameters:
confDict

Config information

commIntercomm

MPI communicator

rankint

Number of actual process

sizeint

Number of available processes

Returns:
outProfile

Stokes Profiles for each process

outDict

Dictionary with all the folders, x and y position for each process
